context: In 2010, Motorola had not yet split into two companies. The company operated as unified Motorola, Inc. encompassing both mobile phone and enterprise/public safety businesses. The split into Motorola Solutions (public safety and enterprise security) and Motorola Mobility (mobile phones) occurred in January 2011.

competitors.name: Cisco Systems
competitors.notes: Competitor in enterprise communications and networking equipment

competitors.name: Ericsson
competitors.notes: Competitor in telecommunications equipment and services

competitors.name: Nokia
competitors.notes: Competitor in telecommunications equipment and mobile communications

competitors.name: Harris Corporation
competitors.notes: Competitor in public safety communications (later became L3Harris Technologies)
